com.luigisgro.cqf.pca
Class JacobiDiagonalization

java.lang.Object
  com.luigisgro.cqf.pca.JacobiDiagonalization

public class JacobiDiagonalization
extends java.lang.Object

This stand-alone class implements the Jacobi rotation diagonalization of symmetric matrices.

Jacobi Rotation Wikipedia article

Author:
Luigi Sgro

Constructor Summary
JacobiDiagonalization(Matrix m, double epsilon)
          Creates a new Jacobi framework

          One rotation of the matrix.
 void sortEigenvaluesDesc()

Constructor Detail

JacobiDiagonalization

public JacobiDiagonalization(Matrix m,
                             double epsilon)
Creates a new Jacobi framework

Parameters:
m - Matrix to be diagonalized
epsilon - Maximum error to be tolerated for non-diagonal elements
Method Detail

getEigenvectors

public Matrix getEigenvectors()
Returns:
A Matrix containing the eigenvectors in the columns. Ordered if sortEigenvaluesDesc() has been called

getEigenvalues

public Vector getEigenvalues()
Returns:
A vector of the eigenvalues.Ordered if sortEigenvaluesDesc() has been called

getTransformed

public Matrix getTransformed()
Returns:
The (approximately) diagonalized matrix

sortEigenvaluesDesc

public void sortEigenvaluesDesc()
After the diagonalization this method can be used to sort the eigenvector columns based on the descending order of the norm of their eigenvalues

process

public int process(int maxNumberOfIterations)
Performs the diagonalization

Parameters:
maxNumberOfIterations - A maximum number of iterations to be carried out
Returns:
The actual number of iterations performed

rotate

public void rotate(int diag1,
                   int diag2)
One rotation of the matrix. Not to be used in normal circumstances

Parameters:
diag1 - Subscript 1 of the off-diagonal cell to delete
diag2 - Subscript 2 of the off-diagonal cell to delete
